bibl.title: Honorable Discharge Certificate for John J. Moran, October 1, 1919

div1.p: This is Moran's certificate of honorable discharge from the United States Army.

div1.head: Honorable Discharge Certificate for John J. Moran, October 1, 1919
div1.p:
Army of the United States of America
To all who shall see these presents. greeting:
This is to certify that
by direction of the President and under the provisions of section nine of the
act of Congress, approved May eighteen, nineteen hundred and seventeen,
John Joseph Moran,
Captain, Quartermaster Corps,
was honorably discharged from the military service in The United States Army
at Hq. Eastern Dept., Governors Island, N.Y.,
on the First day of October, 1919.
div1.closer:
Thomas H. Ehmy
Major General, U.S.A., Commanding. Form No. 523-7. A.G.O.

div1.head: MILITARY RECORD
div1.closer:
Thomas Harry
Major General, U.S.A., Commanding.
